Params: {3: 'Dulcinea leans forward slightly, closely inspecting the data sample Cervantes just entered.'}
{3: 'The Construct with black-and-red hair looks slightly puzzled by her situation for a second before quickly guarding the door to the stage as commanded.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Although this data sample is only a simulation based on the short time she spent in Constellia, I think it is adequate enough for this game.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "It's something I haven't thought of indeed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Echo\'s data sample doesn\'t seem to like Babylonia "characters" very much.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Placing Lucia here will definitely create more variables in this simulation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "But why don't we use the Gray Raven Commandant's data sample if we're using a Babylonian? That commandant is also quite a unique individual.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Didn't you already use the Gray Raven Commandant's data to run a simulation with Echo during the Palette Clash?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'A simulation is only interesting when the results are unknown. Repeating the same simulation is boring, and you can only come up with the same conclusion.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "We already know what would happen when Echo encounters the Gray Raven Commandant. Let's see what will change when she encounters the Gray Raven Captain.", 4: '2'}
